snippet: An article on Wednesday about a California doctors' union that is affiliating with a larger labor group misstated the influence of the smaller union. The Union of American Physicians and Dentists represents 7 percent of the state's practicing doct...
lead_paragraph: An article on Wednesday about a California doctors' union that is affiliating with a larger labor group misstated the influence of the smaller union. The Union of American Physicians and Dentists represents 7 percent of the state's practicing doctors, not 20 percent, according to the California Medical Association. The article also misstated the total number of unionized doctors. It is 30,000, not 45,000.
abstract: Correction of Aug 27 article on California doctors' union affiliating with larger labor group; Union of American Physicians and Dentists represents 7 percent of state's doctors, not 20 percent (S)

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: UNION OF AMERICAN PHYSICIANS AND DENTISTS
